transcript:
Customer: Haan bilkul aapka feedback hai to company ko dijiye ga main update kar dunga direct WhatsApp pe call pe mil jayega aapko. Feedback miss karna kitna theek hai ye main close kar raha hu baki.
Hello.
Customer: Hmm. Haan Chanchal ji se baat ho rahi hai meri?
Executive: Ji sir main Rahul baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se aapka account manager.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ji sir jo aapka jo concern tha GST ke aap address change karna chahte the GST ke according to aapne mujhe photo bheja hai usme purani GST hai aapka jaise nayi GST me address update ho ke aa jaye to aap mujhe send kar dijiyega WhatsApp pe ya fir mujhe normal call kar lijiyega mere number pe main yaha se change kar dunga.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur hai na sir uske liye main aapko kuch do teen cheeze aur puchna chahunga jo aapko review rating diye gaye hain wo sab genuine hain? Sahi review rating hain?
Customer: Haan genuine sab genuine.
Executive: Haan to review rating sir aap unhi se lijiye jo aapke lead manager tab me ho unse ya fir jinse deal mature hui hai unse wo kuch buylead hai sir aapke liye wo buylead aapko sahi aa rahi hain?
Customer: Buylead sahi aa rahe hain aaj main check kar raha hu pura din main kitna lead aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan wahi dekho jaise ki Barsana se aayi hai kuch ek Pahalpur Bihar se aayi hai electric rickshaw ki aur ek sir Odisha se aayi hai theek hai unko aap check kijiye aur do teen buylead aap consume kar lijiye aaj aapne kuch consume kiye hain?
Customer: Nahi nahi abhi kar raha hu.
Executive: Haan to unko check karke unko consume kijiye buyleads ko aur aapke pass inquiry aur call flow sahi hai aapka call me bhi sir PNS call aapke pass bahut jyada aate hain but aap miss karte ho.
Customer: Haan miss ho ja raha hai abhi.
Executive: Haan miss jyada ho raha hai isliye main yaha pe check kar raha hu dekhiye aapka yaha pe sir almost 7 50 se 60 ke kareeban call aata hai har mahine ka lekin aapke pass 40% calls miss ho jate hain.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Ab ye IndiaMART ko aap hi check kar rahe ho ya aapne koi personal hire kar rakha hai as a account manager?
Customer: Nahi wo to ye number hi mere pass hi hai aur baki ka jaise char aur number hota hai na to wo bhi usme se do abhi band hai.
Executive: Haan usme nahi aapke number char nahi isme do hi add hain lekin aapke usme add honge par aap band karwa diye honge aapne.
Customer: Haan wo band karwaye hain wo to khol denge uske baad wo utha payega na ek to cashier ke pass hai aur ek mere pass hai. Marketing manager ji hai uske pass hai nahi to isliye utha nahi pa rahe kyuki naya project wo jo project project tha na naya abhi wo unit ban raha hai naya.
Executive: Achcha achcha.
Customer: Abhi out of stop of out of market ho gaya pura isliye problem ho raha hai thoda.
Executive: Achcha isi chakkar me but make sure ki aapke na calls hai na unko pick karke apne customer se thoda deal kijiye kyuki kya hai iski wajah se aapka aapke catalog pe response rate down ho jata hai.
Customer: Ji ji theek theek.
Executive: Aur sir ye puch raha tha main aapke jo main concern close kar raha hu uske regarding aapke pass ek mera feedback jayega mere liye.
Customer: Kis cheez ki? Okay.
Executive: Hai na aur sir jo aur is call concern ke regarding jo aapne concern raise kiya tha wo aapka solve hua ki nahi hua hai to mail aayega.
Customer: Haan main kar dunga. Mail me aayega na sir? Koi dikkat nahi main kar raha hu kar raha malum hai koi dikkat nahi.
Executive: Theek hai sir aur koi to issue to nahi hai aapko sir?
Customer: Nahi nahi koi koi problem nahi.
Executive: Aur jaise hi aapki nayi GST aa jaye aaj ya kal me to mujhe aap WhatsApp kar dijiyega main usko yaha se ticket ticket khol ke aapko yaha pe update kar dunga theek hai aapka naam change ho hi gaya hai aapne usko naam change kar diya Ruma kar diya right?
Customer: Haan company me karwa diye kyuki usme dikkat ho raha hai sabhi mujhse contact karega to fir problem ho jayega.
Executive: Haan wahi to aapne yaha par change ho ke ab Ruma Sinha ho gaya yaha pe naam naam me koi dikkat nahi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur ye keh raha tha ki jo previous aapke pass buyleads aati hain wo aapke sath pass sahi aati hongi?
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aur jo aapka ek main product tha aap usme aap bata rahe the kuch wo karke tha kya naam tha uska ek electric scooter tha aapka.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Chakmukhi karke tha sir jiski foreign me bhi demand thi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Jaise ki aap foreign countries jaise Bangladesh, Bhutan aap keh rahe the ki Myanmar se achche orders aa rahe hain to abhi bhi wo aapko response mil raha hai?
Customer: Haan wo Nepal se bhi aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Aur iska bhi aa raha hai lekin wo uska US se jo aata hai jyada aa raha hai wo wheel district home lift pe aa raha hai.
Executive: Kis kis ka ek baar fir se repeat karenge aap?
Customer: Wheel district home lift. Home elevator mujhe choda hua hai.
Executive: Haan.
Haan samajh gaya samajh gaya lekin jo aapko response to achcha mil raha hai to aap aapke pass certificate to hoga na sir?
Customer: Sir kuch hai mujhe thoda production me matlab manufacturing production matlab IndiaMART me chhodne ke baad usse jyada aa raha hai na demand base bhi jyada aaya local area me jyada bheed ho gaya hai.
Executive: Achcha.
Customer: Kyuki dekhiye sabhi to ye Google me search karta hai.
Executive: Haan sahi hai.
Customer: Baniya mera email raha hai to kya un logo ko pata hai direct aa ja rahe hain yaha pe.
Executive: Achcha matlab kya hai Google pe search karke aapka address search karke aap yaha pe direct aa ja rahe hain matlab.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To isliye aap jo address change karana chahte the ki pehle address kuch aur tha aapke ghar ka tha lekin ab office ka karna chahte the.
Customer: Pe ja raha hai sabhi sab kuch ja raha hai.
Executive: Haan haan nahi nahi fir to sahi baat hai aap apne address fir se change kara lijiyega sahi rahega aapke pass.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur ye kya kehte hain aapke numbers yaha pe do hi listed hain PNS call pe main fir se bata deta hu jaise hi aapke number aur aa jaye to unko add kara lijiyega.
Customer: Number add kar dunga.
Executive: Haan inquiry ka flow bhi aapke pass barabar aa raha hai lekin buylead consumption aapka thoda kam ho gaya hai baki to pichle mahine aapka sahi tha aapne October me 15 kiye November me.
Customer: Sir ye jo leads jo kharidte hain wo alag ka ye country ka alag country ka jo kharidte hain haan ye discount wala jo usme kya hota hai ki usme lead jaise kharidne ke baad usme turant use karna padta hai ki baad me kar sakte hain?
Executive: Ek second sir call pe rahiyega ek second rukiye main puch leta hu.
(silence)
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir usme bhi jaise ki aap normal ye India ke within buyleads consume karke call karke baat karte hain waise aapko foreign buyleads pe baat karni hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aapne consume kiye hain kya ek aad foreign buyleads?
Customer: Ek do me koshish kar raha tha wo ek ka Korea ka hoga usme koshish kar raha tha ki lead bhi kharide lekin uske baad usme contact ho nahi paya. Uske baad dusra dusra lead dusra jo me kar raha tha to usko lead ka matlab ye benefit nahi mila mujhe matlab.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: To aap to isse achcha aap lead kyu lead kharidne se achcha to aap wo kijiye na sir kya kehte hain foreign ka sir yaha se plan lijiye kyuki aapki category me sir bahut jyada approved buylead hai foreign ke sir exporter ka.
Customer: Exporter ka jyada aa raha hai dekh rahe hain.
Executive: Exporter ka dekho main yaha pe dekh raha hu electric scooter ka bahut jyada aa raha hai electric bicycle ka usse jyada aa raha hai.
Customer: Usme jyada aa raha hai ki wo mera ye LinkedIn profile hai na wahin se jyada aa raha hai.
Executive: Haan wahin se to aapke pass foreign buyleads me aapke pass achchi approved buylead hai aapko foreign me achcha business milega kyuki aapka hai na cost effective products hai sare.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Is wajah se.
Customer: Uske liye kya karna padega?
Executive: Uske liye sir foreign buyleads ke liye sir jaise aapki jo ye service aapki chal rahi hai abhi IndiaMART pe waise sir foreign buyleads ke liye bhi kuch service hoti hai wo aapko service leni padegi.
Customer: Achcha.
Executive: Yearly hoti hai wo service loge to then usme jaise aapko isme basic service me aapko India India ke andar ki buyleads milti hai usme aapko foreign ki milengi.
Executive: Foreign ki buyleads milengi foreign se call aayenge foreign se inquiry aayegi.
Executive: Aur sir waha se verified buyleads or inquiries aati hain sir.
Customer: Haan haan wo kuch nahi hai. Haan jitna bhi ho jitna bhi aata hai na wo pura genuine aate hain kyuki India me kya hota hai sir 10 me se ek do lag jate hain na ek to fir aise hi hota hai.
Executive: Dekho India me kya hota hai aapka aapka hamara swabhav kya hai pehle jankari lenge uske ek mahine baad kharidenge.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sahi baat hai na sir? Aapka mera kya swabhav hai main are Ruma Chanchal ji kuch bech rahe hain sab Chanchal ji se puch liya unke pass wale se puch lete hain wo kya rate de rahe hain.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Lekin unko ye nahi pata hai ki Chanchal ji jab bech rahe hain to pass wale ke according hi to bech rahe hain agar Chanchal ji unse jyada mahanga bechenge to kaun kharid lega?
Customer: Arey wo aise swabhav hai aise kya karenge.
Executive: Haan wahi to nahi aapka bhi wahi swabhav hai mera bhi wahi swabhav hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Baat to wo hai na lekin kya foreign kya hote hain unko jo requirement hoti hai wo genuinely post karte hain unko instantly post karte hain unko chahiye rehta hai yaha pe aap kisi bhi buylead ko follow karoge to follow up me aapko panch che din laga dega 10 din laga dega uske baad aapki deal mature hogi lekin waha se within two se three days me mature ho jati hai interested client ke sath.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To main abhi apna address change kara lijiye lekin fir uske agar aap interested ho to foreign buyleads ke regarding main kisi se contact karta hu to aapse achche se describe kar denge kaisa kya procedure hai.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai to ek baar phone kar lena aaj to abhi puja me ja raha hu kal tak kar lena sir kya karna hoga theek hai.
Executive: Haan sir kal discuss kar denge fir foreign ke liye right?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to update GST address.

- Misses many PNS calls.

- Inquires about foreign buyleads usage.



Resolution:

- Executive will update GST address after receiving it.

- Advised to pick up calls to improve catalog response.

- Explained benefits of foreign buyleads.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back to discuss foreign buyleads.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Positive



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, address change, buyleads, foreign buyleads
